step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep focusing on placing your hands on your abdomen.
Excellent! You are successfully placing your hands on your abdomen. Continue to focus on this placement.
Great job inhaling slowly through your nose. Try to tighten your whole body muscles a bit more during the inhale, and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
You are exhaling slowly through your mouth. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale and visualize pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
